extendedInfo.description: This application provides an option to donate for our free "Where Am I?" application.Thank you for your donation!PLEASE EMAIL instead of posting comments if you have problems. I cannot help if you don't email because I don't have any way of contacting you.New in 1.0d: - name changed back to "Where Am I?"

reviews.title: Most accurate / fastest
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried several different location apps & this is the most accurate and the fastest at locating my position.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply the best,
reviews.comment: location app on the market.  Works really well and its accurate. Evo 3D.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent location app!!
reviews.comment: Finally found this app that does exactly what I need and does it very well. I really like the nice and clean layout and UI. Cross street is super useful. Thanks for making it a free app as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would it be possible to create a simple widget for this to easily share location without opening the application?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please update having a problem saying can\'t down low geo information
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I had to donate to support developer. Every good job deserves some compensation.
reviews.author: A Google User
